00019 string currentView = "Vehicle";

00023 void shape_cb( Fl_Widget* o){
00024         vehDrawWindow->placing = o->label();
00025         vehDrawWindow->dragging = true;
00026         
00027         vehDrawWindow->currentShape = o->label();
00028         fl_cursor(FL_CURSOR_CROSS);
00029         vehDrawWindow->redraw();
00030         vehicleTab->redraw();
00031         tabs->redraw();
00032 }
00033 
00034 void open_cb(Fl_Widget*, void*) {
00035         vehDrawWindow->file = fileChooser->chooseFile(Fl_File_Chooser::SINGLE, "*.xml" , "Open File");
00036 }
00037 
00038 void connector_cb(Fl_Widget* o)
00039 {
00040         fl_cursor(FL_CURSOR_CROSS);
00041         vehDrawWindow->placing = "Connector";
00042         vehDrawWindow->connecting = true;
00043         vehDrawWindow->redraw();
00044 }
00045 
00046 void notConnector_cb(Fl_Widget* o)
00047 {
00048         fl_cursor(FL_CURSOR_CROSS);
00049         vehDrawWindow->placing = "Not Connector";
00050         vehDrawWindow->connecting = true;
00051         vehDrawWindow->notConnector=true;
00052         vehDrawWindow->redraw();
00053 }
00054 // Callback: when user picks 'Quit'

00056         exit(0);
00057 }

00095 void vehicle_cb(Fl_Widget* o, void*){
00096         string filename = fileChooser->chooseFile(Fl_File_Chooser::CREATE, "*.xml", "Select A Vehicle");
00097         if(filename != ""){
00098                 envDrawWindow->placing = o->label();
00099                 envDrawWindow->nextFileName = filename;
00100                 envDrawWindow->connecting = true;
00101                 fl_cursor(FL_CURSOR_CROSS);
00102                 envDrawWindow->redraw();
00103         }
00104 }

00110 void saveMap_cb(Fl_Widget* o, void*){
00111         string filename = fileChooser->chooseFile(Fl_File_Chooser::CREATE, "*.xml", "Save Map As");
00112         envDrawWindow->save(filename);
00113

00117 void laodVeh_cb(Fl_Widget* o, void*){
00118         string filename = fileChooser->chooseFile(Fl_File_Chooser::CREATE, "*.xml", "Save Map As");
00119         vehModel->load(vehDrawWindow ,filename);
00120 }
00121 
00122 void saveVeh_cb(Fl_Widget* o, void*){
00123         const char* name = fl_input("Choose Vehicle Name", "New Vehicle");
00124         string filename = fileChooser->chooseFile(Fl_File_Chooser::CREATE, "*.xml", "Save Vehicle As");
00125         vehModel->save(vehDrawWindow->shapes, filename, name);
00126 }

00134 void clearEnv_cb(Fl_Widget* o, void*){
